price: (13) How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
